Package com.view

Interface View

All Known Subinterfaces:
ActiveView, PassiveView
All Known Implementing Classes:
CommandLineView, GraphicalInterfaceView, Views
public interface View
The interface View. A view is a way to interact with users.

    Modifier and Type Method Description

    Show current player.
